New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2025 年 1 月 16 日星期四 06:16:30 +0000 zh 1每小时1
‘Serious’ privacy breach: Suppressed details of abuse victims revealed on Justice website, mass audit under way https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serious-privacy-breach-suppressed-details-of-abuse-victims-revealed-on-justice-website-mass-audit-under-way/5CWPI5H7DFHCVBKAO5FUMPUDJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serious-privacy-breach-suppressed-details-of-abuse-victims-revealed-on-justice-website-mass-audit-under-way/5CWPI5H7DFHCVBKAO5FUMPUDJU/ Katie HarrisA mass audit of thousands of decisions is now under way after the privacy slip-up. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:07:16 +0000 The error was identified by a Herald reporter. Photo / 123RF
Golriz Ghahraman shoplifting allegations: Former MP reportedly seen putting items into tote bag at Pak’nSave https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/golriz-ghahraman-shoplifting-allegations-former-mp-reportedly-seen-putting-items-into-tote-bag-at-paknsave/L7MOHNG775GU5HKCA4U224KJFU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/golriz-ghahraman-shoplifting-allegations-former-mp-reportedly-seen-putting-items-into-tote-bag-at-paknsave/L7MOHNG775GU5HKCA4U224KJFU/ The former MP was allegedly observed on CCTV by a member of the store's staff. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:03:23 +0000 Golriz Ghahraman resigned from Parliament last year. Photo / NZME
Huka Falls kayaking: Warnings as extreme athletes take on iconic drop https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/huka-falls-kayaking-warnings-as-extreme-athletes-take-on-iconic-drop/JAOVDIJNSNDCVCBPQJ6XLJV2TU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/huka-falls-kayaking-warnings-as-extreme-athletes-take-on-iconic-drop/JAOVDIJNSNDCVCBPQJ6XLJV2TU/ Maryana Garcia'You get a good second of flying through the air before you hit the bottom.' Thu, 16 Jan 2025 05:25:14 +0000 Extreme freestyle kayaking world champion Zack Mutton said going over Huka Falls was always “a pretty fun ride”. Photo / Rod Hill
Thieves steal $75k worth of safety fences on Auckland’s North Shore https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thieves-steal-75k-worth-of-safety-fences-on-aucklands-north-shore/BUILU3OUI5BWNO2RCWLKINYFOA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/thieves-steal-75k-worth-of-safety-fences-on-aucklands-north-shore/BUILU3OUI5BWNO2RCWLKINYFOA/ More than 60 panels were uprooted from on top of a newly built retaining wall. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 05:01:21 +0000 A total of 76 panels have been stolen from around the North Shore. Photo / Supplied via RNZ
Coroner found driver error was the cause of triple road fatality near Matamata https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-found-driver-error-was-the-cause-of-a-triple-road-fatality-near-matamata/2N7ARNZZNFDMRALOOGVEHDUANI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-found-driver-error-was-the-cause-of-a-triple-road-fatality-near-matamata/2N7ARNZZNFDMRALOOGVEHDUANI/ Ric StevensA couple from Hamilton and a man from Auckland died in the 2022 crash. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Three people died in a two-car collision after a vehicle crossed the centre line on a long left-hand bend on State Highway 29 near Matamata in 2022. Photo / Google Maps
Sounds of Celtic to ring from Gisborne’s Smash Palace at Rennie Pearson concert https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/sounds-of-celtic-to-ring-from-gisbornes-smash-palace-at-rennie-pearson-concert/MLWNLS4FXVCI3JH4QWHGAAPXTA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/sounds-of-celtic-to-ring-from-gisbornes-smash-palace-at-rennie-pearson-concert/MLWNLS4FXVCI3JH4QWHGAAPXTA/ Kim Parkinson'Blending centuries-old melodies with vibrant energy and artistry' Thu, 16 Jan 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Rennie Pearson plays traditional music from Ireland, Scotland and the maritimes of Canada. He is performing in Gisborne on February 2.
Social media influencer David Pegler, aka David Grr, revealed as serial sex offender https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/social-media-influencer-david-pegler-aka-david-grr-revealed-as-serial-sex-offender/EAVTW73HP5BHXPFCP67UP57TCE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/social-media-influencer-david-pegler-aka-david-grr-revealed-as-serial-sex-offender/EAVTW73HP5BHXPFCP67UP57TCE/ Craig KapitanThe former socialite had maintained suppression despite having been in prison since 2022. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 04:03:10 +0000 David Pegler, aka influencer David Grr, appears in the High Court at Auckland for sentencing on multiple sexual abuse charges in October 2022. Photo / Michael Craig
Gisborne-based foodbank closes after eight years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-based-foodbank-closes-after-eight-years/ACCSSRPOXFEJPF276AYWUKQIVE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-based-foodbank-closes-after-eight-years/ACCSSRPOXFEJPF276AYWUKQIVE/ Wynsley WrigleyJohnathan Pere said he 'had a bit of a cry' after making the decision. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 04:00:00 +0000 Johnathan Pere packing food parcels in 2020 during the early days of the Covid pandemic. Pere has decided to shut down his foodbank after eight years. Photo / Paul Rickard
Thames homicide inquiry: Well-known musician ‘devastated’ by news of relative’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/thames-homicide-inquiry-well-known-musician-devastated-by-news-of-relatives-death/NVAJBDLD7VFSHI65HWDVRVLO6Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/thames-homicide-inquiry-well-known-musician-devastated-by-news-of-relatives-death/NVAJBDLD7VFSHI65HWDVRVLO6Q/ Al WilliamsWell-known musician pays tribute to 'a guy we all liked'. Thu, 16 Jan 2025 04:00:00 +0000 Police cordoned off a street in Thames this week after a man who was found with moderate injuries later died in hospital.
Most Gisborne and East Coast swim sites get safety thumbs up after water quality testing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/most-gisborne-and-east-coast-swim-sites-get-safety-thumbs-up-after-water-quality-testing/MLVMQ6DZ65HDVACHBFWEHTY7G4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/most-gisborne-and-east-coast-swim-sites-get-safety-thumbs-up-after-water-quality-testing/MLVMQ6DZ65HDVACHBFWEHTY7G4/ Murray RobertsonLatest tests clear nearly all sites across the region for swimming and bathing. Photo / Murry Cave from GDC Facebook
